welcome_message_body: Welcome to Takarazuka, a charming city known for its beautiful theaters and hot springs. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the wonderful sights and experiences it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport. No password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.
